titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to provide a limitation on the terms of United States Senators and Representatives.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights.

bill.summary: 3/24/1993--Introduced. Constitutional Amendment - Provides that no person shall serve in the Senate for more than two full terms or in the House of Representatives for more than six full terms.
